name: Bouncy (marina.balves)
description:
Created by Marina Bendocchi Alves

Jump'n'Run fun with evil bouncing balls, Ethan, ugly trees and stupid cubes. My 1st game. Created in Unity.

Move Third Person Controller with WASD or Arrow keys. Jump with Space bar. Use mouse to control the camera.

Updates:

V2: + Menu + faster Respawn after Fallout

V3: + increased difficulty + Reset all objects with Respawn

V4: + Fallout bug fixed + end game with Collision Trigger

V5: + new features + Music + Sprites
